mapper.update: update license license_nm=#{license_nm},qualify_date=#{qualify_date},issuer=#{issuer} where free_no = (select free_no from freelancer where free_id=#{free_id})
update partners partners_nm=#{partners_nm},details=#{details} where free_no = (select free_no from freelancer where free_id=#{free_id})
update company_history yearmonth=#{yearmonth},details=#{details} where free_no = (select free_no from freelancer where free_id=#{free_id})
update skill skill_nm=#{skill_nm},skill_lev=#{skill_lev} where free_no = (select free_no from freelancer where free_id=#{free_id})
